Class JavaBoxExecutionControl

java.lang.Object
jdk.jshell.execution.DirectExecutionControl
jdk.jshell.execution.LocalExecutionControl
org.dellroad.javabox.execution.LocalContextExecutionControl
org.dellroad.javabox.JavaBoxExecutionControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, ExecutionControl
public class JavaBoxExecutionControl extends LocalContextExecutionControl
The LocalExecutionControl used by JavaBox itself.

  • Method Details

    • invokeWithContext

      protected Object invokeWithContext(Method method) throws Throwable
      Description copied from class: LocalContextExecutionControl
      Execute the given snippet in context.

      The implementation in LocalContextExecutionControl uses LocalContextExecutionControl.enterContext() and leaveContext() to bracket the execution of the snippet and the decoding of its result (via valueStringWithContext()). The decoded result is wrapped in a StringWrapper to prevent duplicate decoding by JShell.

      If LocalContextExecutionControl.enterContext() itself throws an exception, leaveContext() is not invoked.

      Overrides:
      invokeWithContext in class LocalContextExecutionControl
      Parameters:
      method - static snippet method
      Returns:
      non-null result from snippet execution stringified by valueStringWithContext() and wrapped in a StringWrapper, or null if result is null
      Throws:
      Throwable - if an exception occurs

    • load

      public void load(ExecutionControl.ClassBytecodes[] cbcs) throws ExecutionControl.ClassInstallException, ExecutionControl.NotImplementedException, ExecutionControl.EngineTerminationException
      Specified by:
      load in interface ExecutionControl
      Overrides:
      load in class LocalExecutionControl
      Throws:
      ExecutionControl.ClassInstallException
      ExecutionControl.NotImplementedException
      ExecutionControl.EngineTerminationException

    • enterContext

      protected void enterContext()
      Description copied from class: LocalContextExecutionControl
      Enter a new thread-local context for snippet execution.

      The implementation in LocalContextExecutionControl does nothing.

      Overrides:
      enterContext in class LocalContextExecutionControl

    • leaveContext

      protected void leaveContext(Object result, Throwable error)
      Description copied from class: LocalContextExecutionControl
      Exit the thread-local context previously entered by LocalContextExecutionControl.enterContext() in the current thread.

      The implementation in LocalContextExecutionControl does nothing.

      Overrides:
      leaveContext in class LocalContextExecutionControl
      Parameters:
      result - the return value from the successful execution of an expression snippet, otherwise null
      error - the exception thrown by snippet execution if there was an error, otherwise null

    • valueStringWithContext

      protected String valueStringWithContext(Object result)
      Description copied from class: LocalContextExecutionControl
      Decode the snippet result into a String for display in the JShell console.

      The implementation in LocalContextExecutionControl just invokes DirectExecutionControl.valueString(java.lang.Object).

      Overrides:
      valueStringWithContext in class LocalContextExecutionControl
